idea-plugin.name: Quantum DSL (QTN) Syntax Highlighting
idea-plugin.description: Syntax highlighting for Photon Quantum3 DSL (.qtn) files in JetBrains IDEs. Supports all QTN constructs including components, structs, enums, flags, unions, events, signals, and more.

  • 한글/영어 다국어 지원
